text: Demonic possession is a term used to describe a situation when a demon (a devil) controls a human being or (sometimes) animal. In many cultures and religions people often used to believe that a devil could enter the body of a person and control them. They often thought this was happening when a person seemed to be mad, or when they had a fit, or when they fainted. ==Related pages== * Demon * Demonology * Umbrella (song), a song that has been claimed to be about demonic possession.
